column4: Just upgraded from Ubuntu 7.04 to 7.10 -- enabeled visual effects ... where can I find the hotkeys or controls to switch between different view modes (ie: 3d cube for instance)
Compiz-control settings manager...Then you can play with all of the key bindings
Generally, in my experience, they will tell you if you messed with the partition table you screwed it and are on your own
